In three sentences

University of Baltimore is a fairly safe campus. Students are advised to be careful as they are on any other campus. There have been a few incidents, but the University of Baltimore Police Department is very helpful and very proactive in solving and preventing crimes.
University of Baltimore has a lot of different clubs and allows students to create their own clubs. The school also has planned activities and trips, such as the New York Trip.
Because of the university's location, parking differes from those at other schools. There is limited free parking on the streets. However, there are a number of different parking garages.

This university is affordable and does not have a high tuition like many other universities. Students are also able to apply for financial aid and different scholarships. Students are also awarded for good grades and involvement.

University of Baltimore offers many different clubs and programs, which allow students to participate in different activities and trips. Furthermore, students can start their own clubs, go to talent nights, attend free shows, go to the block party (1 per semester), and attend events with speakers and guests. Students may also take part in intramural sports and games.

University of Baltimore is located in midtown Baltimore, an area which offers different kinds of food and restaurants. Students have a variety of choices to pick from and are able to purchase a meal at an affordable price.
University of Baltimore does not have a traditional dorm life. However, they have built new apartments which include a gym, Dunkin Donuts, along with other great features.

Professors at the University of Baltimore challenge students to do their best and help them gain a broader perspectives of the world. They also provide advice, suggestions, and guidance for students to enable them to succeed.

Students who are attending this school or are planning on attending this school should take advantage of tutoring as the staff is very helpful. Also, joining a club is a great way to be involved and become a part of the community.

University of Baltimore is a great school environment as it offers a variety of classes and degrees. Moreover, it offers tutoring opportunities as well as a number of different clubs, organizations, and extracurricular activities. University of Baltimore is also a green school and is involved in activities which help the environment.

textAfterTable: Am enjoying being here Being at UB, all our sports are intramural. Even with that, UB find other ways to keep you involved with things on campus. We've had block parties, pep rallies, and they make you feel right at home. Am learning a lot UB has alot to offer. They provide resources, and so many workshops to help and prepare you for your college career!
